[CENTER][COLOR=#0000ff][SIZE=7]♦Features:♦[/SIZE][/COLOR] [COLOR=#ff0000][SIZE=5]•500+ NPC's •24/7 Server •60 Player Commands •All skill working except Farming and Herblore (Being worked on) •Some custom items •Kill NPC's for good $$$ •Custom NPC attack backs •Custom Drops •Custom MiniGames •A Lucky Chest •Fixed Mostly all of Delta's Bugs •Hardened Bosses •Bounty System •PK System •Tokkul System •PC System •Assault System •Fight pits •Barrows •Pest Control •Assault •And much much more! [/size][/color][/center] 10/17/11
Fixed Slayer XP Ratio, and added new NPCS Fixed Drop rate of NPC's ITems Added a Monster Killing Minigame Added a Login Message Added a New player Command Added a Announce command with a timer Added a Bounty Hunter!! Fully working Fixed Herblore.. I think! Added a ::slayerreset command Added a Gamble/Random Chest Added a party Command Added a Level up Interface Added a HALLOWEEN EVENT Fixed Range and Arrows Dropping Fixed Ice Spells Fixed a Teleporting Bug Fixed Dupes and Bugs
